subject: Hockey, Ice
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The tournament favorites Russia and Canada won convincingly on the opening day of the world championship in Switzerland. Russia, the defending champion, beat Germany, 5-0, in Bern. Steve Stamkos and Dany Heatley each scored twice for Canada, the silver medalists last year, in a 6-1 win over Belarus in Zurich.
